desc: Flawless Crystals Australia is an online store based in Perth that provides dancers with the highest quality flat back, sew on crystals, crystal AB rhinestones, with a wide range of colours and sizes. Including ss16, ss20, ss30, ss40, accessories for dancesport and all styles of dance wear costume decorations.

layout.text: "Beautiful rhinestones - really amazing quality and fabulous prices. Rosa really knows her stuff! I would recommend Flawless Crystals to anyone wanting to add some real sparkle to their costume, dance shoes, anything. I've seen and used many of these crystals and I love them all. Highly recommend." - Jacky
